properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 7:41AM AKST until January 22 at 2:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Around 3 inches of snow have fallen since Tuesday
afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches
expected.

* WHERE...Juneau area with greatest accumulations in the
Mendenhall Valley.

* WHEN...Until 2 PM AKST this afternoon. Snowfall rates will be
greatest Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions will impact the morning commute. Heavy wet snow will
make snow removal difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect Downtown Juneau to change to rain
through the day, limiting snow accumulations there. Rain will
mix in elsewhere through the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON
